name: Simon Says (Graham)
description:
This is my first original game, it is essentially the Simon Says children's game, but with a few twists. I hope you enjoy, and tell me what you think.

Controls:

- Memorize the pattern of the flashing lights and click the buttons in the order you see them light up.

(The level selection screen is a little bugged so if you try and choose the "Wacky Simon" game mode it may take you back to the title screen. I am working on a fix, and it shouldn't be long until it works fine.)
